alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pine, southeastern St. Louis, Carlton, southwestern Lake, central Bayfield, Douglas and northwestern Ashland Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 333 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mahtowa, to near Solon Springs, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and thundersnow with very poor visibilities. Some locations may get a wintry mix of freezing rain or sleet. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Road conditions may deteriorate rapidly with ice covered roads. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Nebagamon around 340 PM CDT. Brule, Wrenshall and Thomson around 345 PM CDT. Iron River and Oulu around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Proctor, Hermantown, Pike Lake Near Duluth, City of Rice Lake, Island Lake, French River, Cornucopia and Stoney Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
